<title

>
[Heavy Rondache](/Shields.aspx?ID=10)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 20 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 4 gp

**AC Bonus** 1 

**Speed Penalty** —
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Bulk** 1

**Hardness** 5

**HP (BT)** 24 (12)
</row>

</column>

---

Similar in size to a [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1), this steel shield is intended to absorb as many blows as possible instead of deflecting attacks. It features multiple layers of metal and is reinforced with additional wood.

<title level="2">Specific Magic Shields</title>
[Starfall Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1861)
name: Heavy Rondache
